show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Looking for Work?
content:
In addition to understanding one’s personal strengths and skills, you have to consider a checklist of actions that I… describe.
Mostly it has to do with an understanding of future trends.
A personal vision of the future is very helpful in this regard.
These aspects are not widely discussed but are indispensable to a successful search.
An audio excerpt from the worldly wisdom of Sir Alan Greenspan (only 90 seconds – oh, come on, stop complaining!
) Some statistical reminders of the lack of ‘economic recovery’.
The falling wages disaster.
The US middle class is no longer the world’s top earner, in fact, it is in 24th place.
50% of residents in Illinois and Connecticut say they’d like to move to a different state (how about a different country?)
